PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
• For Billions of Items at Amazon, calculated priorities of each item according to a statistical model and found top 100 items using AWS EMR with Hadoop, Hive and Hbase
• Handled real time updates of different parameters of the Items using AWS Kinesis

• Made a Software and a Hardware using ffmpeg library and Arduino UNO.
• Two person can see different content on a single screen at a time in full screen mode using the software. Also they can hear different audio without earphone.
• Got our name published in the newspaper

Made a backup/restore software based on rsync utility. Users can backup their files/folders across network by assigning low/high priority to them. It supports level 0 and level 1 backup. 

User can see available backups (by date/time) of a given file/folder and restore it selectively. Various errors were taken care like network failure during backup and backup disk partition full.

Used Shell scripts and Python scripts. Socket programming was also used.
• Made a electronic game snake and ladder for two player using AT-Mega 16 Microcontroller, LED matrix and other things.
• Made a Banking Website. One can debit, credit and transfer money. Web languages used in this website were PHP, HTML, CSS and JavaScript. MySQL database was used.

• Made a website like CraigsList or OLX in which users can upload ads, view ads, delete ads, apply filters etc.
• Web languages used were PHP, HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Dream weaver was used for front ending. MySQL Database was used.
